body.name: SAFAVIEH Antiquity Collection 2' x 3' Olive / Green AT824A Handmade Traditional Oriental Premium Wool Accent Rug
features: The handmade, hand-tufted construction adds durability to this rug, ensuring it will be a favorite for many years
Each rug is handmade with premium, hand-spun wool
For over 100 years, Safavieh has been a trusted brand for uncompromised quality and unmatched style
Product Note : Rugs may contain temporary creases upon arrival, allow time for creases to flatten and settle
body.description: Safavieh' s Antiquities Collection evokes the old world style and quality with modern hand tufting techniques. These rugs bring traditional sophistication and the authentic look and feel of 19th century Persian rugs. These rugs are made from 100% premium, hand-spun wool, and employ ancient pot-dying techniques to give them their authentic look. The soft palettes and open fields make these rugs easy to match to any decor. Each rug has a dense, soft pile, and excellent quality, to ensure that you will enjoy the look and feel of your rug for years to come.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Over 100 Years of Excellence in Home Furnishings Timeless Style Quality Craftsmanship Trusted Brand Safavieh's Antiquity Rug Collection Antique Designed Area Rugs The refined look of antique rug design is refreshed in the Antiquity Rug Collection with its rich colors and old world motifs. Traditionally styled area rugs impart an heirloom quality Special herbal wash enhances the aged patina for a marvelously timeless look Hand-tufted of 100% hand-spun premium wool Medium 0.5-inch pile height for cushioned softness underfoot These rugs work beautifully in the dining room, living room, master suite, or home office
Persian Inspired Rug Artistry Classic Colors Bold Medallions Oriental Motifs

Safavieh's Designer Rug Size Guide: The Living Room Whether in an apartment in the city or a comfortable small- to mid-size living space, a 5’ x 8’ rug is ideal for those looking to make their room look and feel more spacious. Designer Tip: Place your sofa or club chairs at the very edge of the rug with legs off to maintain stabilization and avoid a cluttered look and feel. To accommodate a mid- to large-size living room, an 8’ x 10’ rug is the most popular room layout with maximum comfort underfoot to add proportion and balance. Designer Tip: Place the front legs of your sofa or club chair on the outer edges of the rug to maintain stabilization and avoid a cluttered look and feel. For a large room, showcase a stunning 9’ x 12’ or 10’ x 14’ area rug to make a grand statement in a living space designed for luxurious entertainment gatherings. Designer Tip: Place your sofa, sectional, or club chairs with all legs on top of the rug for a much more “pulled-together” look and feel in large spaces.

Safavieh's Designer Rug Size Guide: The Dining Room and Bedroom Use a 5’ x 8’ rectangular rug in smaller dining areas with a table and 4 – 6 chairs. Designer Tip: Make sure that the edge of the dining table is a minimum of 2 feet away from the edge of your area rug. Use an 8’ x 10’ or 9’ x 12’ rug in larger dining areas with a table and 6 – 8 chairs. Designer Tip: Ensure placement allows a minimum of 18” of bare floor from the edge of the rug to any wall. For a bedroom, a 5’ x 8’ rug is ideal for a full or twin size bed, and an 8’ x 10’ or 9’ x 12’ rug works well with a king or queen size bed. Designer Tip: The rug looks best when placed perpendicular under the bed with enough rug exposed on either side to place your feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful wool rug
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these rugs and I am very happy with them. They were well packed with desiccant packets and did not have any smell of mildew only the faint smell of wool which confirmed that they were authentic wool rugs. The wool smell was gone after the first day. The little amount of shedding when vacuumed was explained on the packaging as normal and the rugs are still very thick and beautiful. They are very well made and lay flat. I love the deep, rich, shades of green.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wool and expensive but beautiful!!
reviews.reviewText: Such a rich design. And the color is gorgeous!! And is THICK!! Def not a synthetic fiber. Love that it’s wool and got a smaller size to try out but I may be purchasing a larger one to cover whole of living room in future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL ANTIQUITY COLLECTION PIECE, DURABLE
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three SAFAVIEH wool rugs from the antiquity collection. All are the same pattern.. I gave a 6'x6' one as a gift. I bought a 7'6" x 9'6" for my family room and after five years I just decided I should have purchased the 9'x12' size. So I did! I will gift the replaced rug. SO - that's how much I love the quality and pattern of this rug. The Amazon premium delivery for $29.99 was worth it! The 2-person team was prompt, professional, gracious, and helpful. They put the rug right where I wanted it, and offered to move it if that didn't look right. I am very happy.ADVICE: If you buy a SAFAVIEH wool rug you need to change your vacuum, bag OFTEN for the first several times over it. The shedding is not apparent (to me) on the rug, but the accumulation of wool in the vacuum is significant for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A genuine dyed wool rug
reviews.reviewText: A great rug for its price. It’s soft under foot, vacuums easily and looks as good as the photos advertising it.Like all new wool rugs, it sheds a lot at first but now it’s done after a few months, and there is still a lot of it left! Not to worry, even though it seems like too much shedding, this rug has lots of yarn; it’s edges are well finished and the rug was pretty true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful deep colors
reviews.reviewText: The colors on this rug are dark and deep. Super high qualitt, thick and luxurious feel under foot. Note, you will get a lot of loose fibers the first time you vacuum which is to be expected. The rug has held up to heavy use iny daughter's bedroom

reviews.reviewerName: 5th Grade Report Card: Linda is outspoken…5th Grade Report Card: Linda is outspoken…
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Disclaimer: Cut pile wool rugs WILL shed fibers for several months while vacuuming. Will your new rug eventually be threadbare? No. Will it cover your whole house in a blanket of wool and smother the life out of your cat? Nope.This is my third Safavieh rug in 20 years (I have them in other rooms, didn’t get rid of them), and this one is my favorite, hands down. The pattern is subtle and the colors are exactly as my screen read them in the ad—modern muted tones of grey. No smells, as mentioned in other reviews. It’s thick and soft underfoot, and, I’m being serious, the very best bang for your buck out there. Buy this rug now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This a high quality wool rug that added a nice touch of color to a high traffic area in our home. Received earlier than expected delivery date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect wool rug -class and style
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this rug. I have several from this manufacturer (Safavieh). This rug is true to color and quality. Very thick and made well (most wool rugs do shed). If you want a functional statement rug -look ito this brand. Caution: I had bought one earlier and returned it as it was very thin and poor quality (UPS pickup -no prob). Pile hight does not tell the story, but certain collections from this brand vary -so do some research.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the rug and wish I’d bought the bigger one
reviews.reviewText: Love the color and look of this rug. It looks exactly as pictured and complements the neutrals in my room very well.
